links.title: Divine Discontent: Disruption's Antidote
links.description: It is nothing but a number, no different than 999,999,999,999 for all practical purposes, but we humans are not practical creatures: we attach importance to all kinds of silly things, round numbers chief amongst them. To that end, an increasingly popular parlor question in the stocks as entertainment business is which company will be worth $1 trillion first?

messages.body: $AAPL https://www.forbes.com/sites/gordonkelly/2018/05/06/apple-iphone-problem-calls-facetime-ios11-ios-11-3-1-iphone-repair/

links.title: Apple Warns iPhones Have A Serious Problem
links.description: In a leaked internal document attained by the ever-reliable , Apple is warning Authorized Service Providers that iOS 11.3 and iOS 11.3.1 have been crippling iPhones. Most notably the iPhone 7 and iPhone 7 Plus, which are unable to use their microphones during calls or be heard at all during FaceTime chats.

$AAPL https://www.cnbc.com/2018/05/04/warren-buffetts-berkshire-hathaway-will-make-about-700-million-annually-on-apples-dividend-alone.html

links.title: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway will make about $700 million annually on Apple's dividend alone
links.description: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway will make about $700 million a year from its Apple holdings just by collecting dividends. The Oracle of Omaha revealed to CNBC that Berkshire bought an astoundin g 75 million shares of Apple during the first quarter. That adds to the 165.3 million shares Berkshire already owned at the end of 2017.

messages.body: $AAPL https://www.cnbc.com/2018/05/04/tech-momentum-could-continue-as-buffett-buy-helps-give-apple-best-week-since-2011.html

links.title: Tech's momentum could continue as Buffett buy helps give Apple its best week since 2011
links.description: Friday's tech rally may have set up stocks for more gains in the week ahead, although the market could be tugged at by geopolitical concerns, like trade war talk and Iran. Technology was up 2 percent Friday and 3.2 percent for the week in its first positive week in three.
